column4: How do I install from a .tar.gz file? I already have build-essential installed, what now?
did you after unpacking the tar.gz file entered his directory and typed ./configure && make && make install
I got to the ./configure and it says bash: ./configure: No such file or directory
are you inside the package directory ? So maybe it has no configure... read any HOWTO/INSTALL/README file inside the directory
